1. S - stop
  2. D - middle screen
  3. F - full screen
  4. X - speed down
  5. C - speed up
  6. M - volume on/off
  7. esc - exi full/middle screen
  8. space - play/pause
  9. num 0-9 - rewind percent
  10. ← and → rewind -10/+10 sec
  11. ↑ and ↓ volume +10%/-10%
  12. mouse wheel up and down volume +5%/-5%
  13. one click play/pause
  14. dbl click center - full screen
  15. dbl click on the edges - rewind +10/-10 sec
